meta_description: Opening January 30, Forecast is an exhibition of artwork from the Remai Modern Collection that contemplates the relationships between people, their environments and the changing climate.
hours_text:
* Jump to:

## Visit Us

## Hours

Monday| Closed  
---|---  
Tuesday| Closed  
Wednesday| 10 AM – 5 PM  
Thursday| 10 AM – 9 PM  
Friday| 10 AM – 9 PM  
Saturday| 10 AM – 5 PM  
Sunday| 10 AM – 5 PM  
  
## Admission

Thanks to the generous support of the Frank and Ellen Remai Foundation, admission to Remai Modern is **by donation on all open days** (free for youth under 18).

[Get art, ideas + more in your inbox. Sign up for our newsletter](https://remaimodern.org/sign-up-for-our-newsletter/)

## Map

## Getting Here

#### Remai Modern is easily accessible from cycling and walking trails and is ideally located downtown in scenic River Landing close to attractions, shops and much more.

Persephone Theatre, Midtown Plaza, TCU Place, and the Riversdale and Broadway communities are all within a 15-minute walk or less.

Remai Modern is serviced by City of Saskatoon bus routes 08, 09, 81, 82, 84 and 86. The Downtown Saskatoon transit terminal is a 15-minute walk to the museum. Fare information can be found [here](https://transit.saskatoon.ca/plan-my-trip) and public transportation routes can be accessed through Google Transit.

Access Transit provides on-demand services for individuals who cannot take fixed route transit some or all of the time due to physical or cognitive disabilities. Visit their website or call: Saskatoon Transit customer service at 306-975-3100 or the customer care line at 306-975-3555.

collections_text:
# Welcome to Remai Modern

Connect to a world of art and find your inspiration at Saskatoon’s museum of modern and contemporary art.

[Plan Your Visit](https://remaimodern.org/visit-us/)

## See what's coming in 2026!

From must-see exhibitions to special events, explore everything happening at Remai Modern.

[Learn More](http://remaimodern.org/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/Whats-On_Remai-Modern_Jan-Mar-2026.pdf)
